EmperorAD_SearchRubble.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The Emperor is not very impressed and directs them towards the rubble to try finding them. They'll encounter a small group of Kobolds digging through the rubble who will be holding them. On entering combat, they'll run away.
EmperorAD_SearchRubble.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_Destroyed

EmperorAD_StonesBack.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The player spots the looters who have the Netherstones and must chase after them. Once they get the stones back, the Emperor expresses relief and a bit of frustration.
EmperorAD_StonesBack.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_DestroyedWalk to the Looters (should see Netherstone icons on map)Kill themLoot the stones

EmperorAD_LootersSpotted.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The player spots the looters who have the Netherstones. The Emperor tells them they must get the stones back.
EmperorAD_LootersSpotted.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_DestroyedWalk to the Looters (should see Netherstone icons on map)

EmperorAD_SearchRubble_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_SearchRubble_0.text: You dropped the Netherstones! Search the rubble and pray no one else found them.

EmperorAD_SearchRubble_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_SearchRubble_1.text: You dropped the Netherstone! Search the rubble and pray that no one else found it.

EmperorAD_StonesBack_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_StonesBack_0.text: To think the world could have ended thanks to a pack of scavenging kobolds. If your fingers are so slippery, leave the Netherstones in your camp.

EmperorAD_LootersSpotted_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LootersSpotted_0.text: There - the kobolds have it! Get them before they escape!

EmperorAD_LootersSpotted_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LootersSpotted_1.text: There - the kobolds have the stones! Get them before they escape!
